body: Hello, I am Husky and I used to play Avicus, so did my sister. However one day my sister advertised another server without knowing she would get banned. Avicus was the 1st server she ever played so she did not know the rules. Can staff please unban her? She is called K_for_Kazza. P.S. This was a perm ban

replies.body: Tell her to appeal by emailing support@avicus.net.

replies.body: Hello sir! As Hack said please have your sister email support@avicus.net so that she can try to be appealed. Thanks!

replies.body: Despite the response will take a while Email the Avicus Support at - support@avicus.net  There is no guarantee you will be unbanned but it depends on the email you send in and the reason you got banned!
